description: A program to examine element-wise differences between two images.

mask.title: Mask
mask.description: Mask to use when comparing the datasets.

quiet_mode.title: Quiet Mode
quiet_mode.description: Quiet mode: 0 for no differences, 1 for differences, -1 for error.

tabular_mode.title: Tabular Mode
tabular_mode.description: Display a table of differences, mainly for 4D data.

brutalist_mode.title: Brutalist Mode
brutalist_mode.description: Display one-liner with summary of differences.

long_report_mode.title: Long Report Mode
long_report_mode.description: Print a detailed report with more information.
